reviewText: Good little dvd for ppl who were fans of the great pete rose.he gives a brief overview of all the positions & a short pep talk at the end.
Bad acting need I say more

I did not find any useful information in this DVD.

I thought there would be some good info on playing base ball.

The "interviews" were poor with Pete Rose talking over over the

interviewer most of the time.

A really good teaching video.  My son and I enjoyed it, and we both learned much from it. Pete covers some really important areas, it just needed to be just a litte more clear in a couple areas to rate a "5".  A baseball teaching/coaching library would not be complete without it.
